name: Jane GRAHAM v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (MAYVIEW STATE HOSPITAL) Petition of Mayview State Hospital
name_abbreviation: Graham v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Jane GRAHAM v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (MAYVIEW STATE HOSPITAL) Petition of Mayview State Hospital.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of December, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, and the order of the Commonwealth Court is REVERSED, pursuant to Eidem v. WCAB, 560 Pa. 439, 746 A.2d 101 (2000). Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Jane GRAHAM v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (MAYVIEW STATE HOSPITAL) Petition of Mayview State Hospital.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 29, 2004.
